data.text:
It'd been a while since I'd officially became a trainer at 
Tracen Academy. And today―
data.processed:
<story>It'd been a while since I'd officially became a trainer at 
<story>Tracen Academy. And today―

data.text: (gorogorogorogorogoro…!!)
data.processed: <story>(gorogorogorogorogoro…!!)

data.text:
I was in an awful state, and ended up 
stumbling my way in to the hospital.
data.processed:
<story>I was in an awful state, and ended up 
<story>stumbling my way in to the hospital.

data.text:
The result of my exam was that it was just simple food 
poisoning. I'm glad it was nothing serious… but, on the way home 
with medicine in hand―
data.processed:
<story>The result of my exam was that it was just simple food 
<story>poisoning. I'm glad it was nothing serious… but, on the way home 
<story>with medicine in hand―

data.text:
For now… congratulations on being 
discharged, Mejiro Ardan. But, please 
make sure you avoid anything too strenuous.
data.name: Doctor
data.processed:
<story>For now… congratulations on being 
<story>discharged, Mejiro Ardan. But, please 
<story>make sure you avoid anything too strenuous.

data.text:
You're probably sick of hearing this by now, but 
make sure you don't overwork yourself! Make sure 
you do your stretches and cooldowns properly!
data.name: Nurse
data.processed:
<story>You're probably sick of hearing this by now, but 
<story>make sure you don't overwork yourself! Make sure 
<story>you do your stretches and cooldowns properly!

data.text:
Repeated fractures and sprains will shorten the 
life span of your legs. Always be cautious with 
your judgement. Do you understand?
data.name: Doctor
data.processed:
<story>Repeated fractures and sprains will shorten the 
<story>life span of your legs. Always be cautious with 
<story>your judgement. Do you understand?

data.text:
Yes, I'm very much aware of it. 
This time too, thank you very much for taking care of me.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Yes, I'm very much aware of it. 
<story>This time too, thank you very much for taking care of me.

data.text:
My lady Ardan. 
The car to pick you up has arrived.
data.name: Elderly Maid
data.processed:
<story>My lady Ardan. 
<story>The car to pick you up has arrived.

data.text:
Oh, Granny, thank you very much. 
…Well then everyone, I will be off.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Oh, Granny, thank you very much. 
<story>…Well then everyone, I will be off.

data.text: Take care! …Seriously, don't push yourself too hard!!
data.name: Nurse
data.processed: <story>Take care! …Seriously, don't push yourself too hard!!

data.text:
That seemed like an awfully strict conversation 
between the doctors and that Uma Musume wearing 
the Tracen Academy uniform — Mejiro Ardan.
data.processed:
<story>That seemed like an awfully strict conversation 
<story>between the doctors and that Uma Musume wearing 
<story>the Tracen Academy uniform — Mejiro Ardan.

data.text:
The next time I saw her was while riding the bus 
back to Tracen Academy.
data.processed:
<story>The next time I saw her was while riding the bus 
<story>back to Tracen Academy.

data.text:
Hmmmmm～… Ah!! 
Ardan-saaaaaaaan!!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmmm～… Ah!! 
<story>Ardan-saaaaaaaan!!

data.text:
Oh, Chiyono O. 
So you were waiting for me again, I see.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Oh, Chiyono O. 
<story>So you were waiting for me again, I see.

data.text:
Yeah, since you were being discharged today! 
I'm glad that you were safely able to return to school…! 
Congratulations, Ardan!!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, since you were being discharged today! 
<story>I'm glad that you were safely able to return to school…! 
<story>Congratulations, Ardan!!

data.text: Fufuu, thank you, as always.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, thank you, as always.

data.text:
But, I seem to have made you wait out in the 
cold. You haven't gotten too cold, have you?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>But, I seem to have made you wait out in the 
<story>cold. You haven't gotten too cold, have you?

data.text:
At the very least, once we return to the dorms let me make 
you some tea. I just happen to have some because a 
visitor brought some―
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>At the very least, once we return to the dorms let me make 
<story>you some tea. I just happen to have some because a 
<story>visitor brought some―

data.text: Huh?… That senpai, she was admitted to the hospital again?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: Huh?… That senpai, she was admitted to the hospital again?

data.text:
Ah- if I remember correctly, before the previous 
Selection Race she was injured or wasn't feeling 
too good and had to withdraw right beforehand.
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Ah- if I remember correctly, before the previous 
<story>Selection Race she was injured or wasn't feeling 
<story>too good and had to withdraw right beforehand.

data.text:
Right before getting started she had to withdraw? 
And she's done it several times? …Eh? Isn't that bad? 
Normally, you'd be in a panic, right?
data.name: Horsegirl C
data.processed:
<story>Right before getting started she had to withdraw? 
<story>And she's done it several times? …Eh? Isn't that bad? 
<story>Normally, you'd be in a panic, right?

data.text: Wait a minute! You over there…!!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>Wait a minute! You over there…!!

data.text:
Chiyono O. 
…Thank you, but, I don't really mind.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Chiyono O. 
<story>…Thank you, but, I don't really mind.

data.text: But, Ardan-!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>But, Ardan-!

data.text: Well, it's all true though.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Well, it's all true though.

data.text: Uu…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>Uu…

data.text:
Alright, Chiyono O. Before we get too cold, 
let's return to the dorms.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Alright, Chiyono O. Before we get too cold, 
<story>let's return to the dorms.

data.text:
Aaah… Mejiro Ardan is it? 
Let's see…
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>Aaah… Mejiro Ardan is it? 
<story>Let's see…

data.text:
For some reason it was bothering me, so I asked Tazuna about her. 
When I did―
data.processed:
<story>For some reason it was bothering me, so I asked Tazuna about her. 
<story>When I did―

data.text:
…It's just as you heard, she's someone that is rather frail and 
gets injured easily. Ever since she's enrolled, she's been 
admitted to the hospital several times.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>…It's just as you heard, she's someone that is rather frail and 
<story>gets injured easily. Ever since she's enrolled, she's been 
<story>admitted to the hospital several times.

data.text:
Because of that, even though she's trying to get started, she's 
had to withdraw from several Selection Races, and has had to 
take many days off from training―
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>Because of that, even though she's trying to get started, she's 
<story>had to withdraw from several Selection Races, and has had to 
<story>take many days off from training―

data.text:
As a result, she's never been scouted and has yet to debut. 
And the evaluations of other trainers… hasn't been too positive either.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>As a result, she's never been scouted and has yet to debut. 
<story>And the evaluations of other trainers… hasn't been too positive either.

data.text:
I… believe she's someone with talent. 
She's an Uma Musume from the famous Mejiro 
family, so she definitely has the potential.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>I… believe she's someone with talent. 
<story>She's an Uma Musume from the famous Mejiro 
<story>family, so she definitely has the potential.

data.text:
It's just that her body is a bit fragile… On top of that, there's 
her older sister as well.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>It's just that her body is a bit fragile… On top of that, there's 
<story>her older sister as well.

data.text:
Even as a new trainer, I'm sure you're familiar with the name. 
One of the Mejiro family's most prominent — Mejiro Ramone.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>Even as a new trainer, I'm sure you're familiar with the name. 
<story>One of the Mejiro family's most prominent — Mejiro Ramone.

data.text:
Winning her debut race with a 20-length margin, and during her 
junior-year recording several times approaching that of the 
'Super Car' Maruzensky.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>Winning her debut race with a 20-length margin, and during her 
<story>junior-year recording several times approaching that of the 
<story>'Super Car' Maruzensky.

data.text: On top of that, being the first one to ever earn the 'Triple Tiara'.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed: <story>On top of that, being the first one to ever earn the 'Triple Tiara'.

data.text:
There's no shortage of anecdotes, about the glory of the 
outstanding and strong older sister… and Ardan being 
overshadowed, but still chasing after her.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>There's no shortage of anecdotes, about the glory of the 
<story>outstanding and strong older sister… and Ardan being 
<story>overshadowed, but still chasing after her.

data.text: Ardan herself, is truly doing her utmost but…
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed: <story>Ardan herself, is truly doing her utmost but…

data.text: At this rate, next time will probably be the last-
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed: At this rate, next time will probably be the last-

data.text: Ah, no! I'm sorry, this is just my speculation. Um―
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed: <story>Ah, no! I'm sorry, this is just my speculation. Um―

data.text:
…But if she's caught your interest, please try 
approaching Ardan, Trainer!
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>…But if she's caught your interest, please try 
<story>approaching Ardan, Trainer!

data.text:
Even with that frail body, chasing after her outstanding 
older sister's shadow, an Uma Musume with a gentle laugh. 
Mejiro Ardan―
data.processed:
<story>Even with that frail body, chasing after her outstanding 
<story>older sister's shadow, an Uma Musume with a gentle laugh. 
<story>Mejiro Ardan―

data.text: …Tomorrow, I decided I'd go and see what her situation was.
data.processed: <story>…Tomorrow, I decided I'd go and see what her situation was.
